name: test-wasm-calling-ts-function
description: Test wasm calling a TypeScript function
author: Wink Saville <wink@saville.com>

scripts.add.nodev9: rm -rf nodev9 && mkdir nodev9 && curl https://nodejs.org/download/v8-canary/v9.0.0-v8-canary201706199cf43ea3fd/node-v9.0.0-v8-canary201706199cf43ea3fd-linux-x64.tar.xz -s -o node-v9.tar.xz && tar -xJf node-v9.tar.xz -C nodev9 --strip-components 1 && rm node-v9.tar.xz
scripts.build.tsc: tsc -p lib/utils.tsconfig.json && tsc -p lib/tsconfig.json && tsc -p src/print_i32.tsconfig.json && tsc -p src/test-nn.tsconfig.json
scripts.test: yarn nodev9 build/print_i32.js && yarn nodev9 build/rand0_1.js && yarn nodev9 build/e_exp.js && yarn nodev9 build/malloc.js && yarn nodev9 build/test-nn.js && yarn nodev9 build/xoroshiro128plus.js
